thread.title: BRIEF-Average Global Insurance Pricing Rose In Q4 For The First Time Since 2013- Marsh

title: BRIEF-Average Global Insurance Pricing Rose In Q4 For The First Time Since 2013- Marsh

organizations.name: first time since 2013- marsh reuters staff

text: February 28, 2018 / 9:00 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Average Global Insurance Pricing Rose In Q4 For The First Time Since 2013- Marsh Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Marsh * MARSH- AVERAGE GLOBAL INSURANCE PRICING INCREASED IN Q4 2017 FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE Q1 2013 * MARSH- PRICE RISE DRIVEN LARGELY BY GLOBAL PROPERTY INSURANCE PRICING, AFFECTED BY LARGE CATASTROPHE LOSSES IN Q3 * MARSH- AVERAGE COMMERCIAL INSURANCE PRICING INCREASED BY 0.8% IN Q4 2017, COMPARED TO A DECREASE OF 1.9% IN Q3 2017 * MARSH- GLOBALLY, PROPERTY INSURANCE PRICING INCREASED 3.2% IN Q4 2017, COMPARED TO A 2.4% DECREASE IN THE PREVIOUS QUARTER * MARSH- REGIONALLY, AVERAGE INSURANCE PRICING INCREASED IN THE UK, LATIN AMERICA AND AUSTRALIA IN Q4 2017 * MARSH- US CYBER INSURANCE PRICING INCREASED FOR THE FIRST TIME IN Q4 2017 SINCE Q4 2016 * MARSH- AVERAGE INSURANCE PRICING DECREASED IN THE US, CONTINENTAL EUROPE, AND ASIA Further company coverage:
